Recent updates from NYC include a tragic incident where a woman was killed by a flying solar panel during a nor'easter, the launch of a new domestic violence unit by the NYPD, and ongoing debates among mayoral candidates regarding housing reforms and responses to Trump’s policies.

- NYC deploying rabies vaccine baits, but Staten Island will not receive any despite numerous cases. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Frost advisory issued for NYC as temperatures drop overnight. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
